name: Global Summit on Vaccines and Immunology
content: Apex GlobalMeetings invites global participants to the Global Summit on Vaccines and Immunology Explore the theme Advancing Vaccines and Immunology A Global Perspective through scientific tracks designed for immersive learning GSVIM2024 fosters collaboration between worldclass experts and young researchers transcending traditional boundaries to address multidisciplinary challenges Be part of an international platform discussing key advances in Vaccines and Immunology Your valuable presence awaits
